mdRecord.dcterms:title: A north view of Pensacola, on the Island of Santa Rosa / drawn by Dom. Serres. Plan of the Harbour and settlement of Pensacola / T. Jefferys sculp
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Serres, Dominic, 1719-1793 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 view and 1 map on a single sheet : b&w. ; 16 x 27 cm. (view) and 19 x 26 cm. (map)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: On the Plan of the Harbour... "Plate 2" is printed at upper left above the neatline and "Page 9" is printed at upper right, also above the neatline. [original]
Relief shown pictorially; depth by soundings. [original]
A north view of Pensacola includes notes: 1. The Fort. 2. The Church. 3. The Government house. 4. The Commandants House. 5. A Well. 6. A Bungo. [original]
According to Phillips, these appeared in "A general topography of North America and the West Indies." London, for R. Sayer & T. Jefferys, nos. 68 a and b. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection. [original]
Scale for Plan of the Harbour... [ca. 1:168,000]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Nautical charts--Florida--Pensacola--Early works to 1800
Views--Early works to 1800
Florida--Maps--Early works to 1800
